description: In 1991, TV producer Kirk Todd was supposed to direct his first movie, Grand Casino, but the movie was never made. Kirk disappeared with the film’s budget and was revealed to be a con man named Jeremy Weaver. We follow host Gwen Radford as she tracks down the victims and puts together the pieces of this con three decades later.
title: This Sounds Serious

itunes.summary: In 1991, TV producer Kirk Todd was supposed to direct his first movie, Grand Casino, but the movie was never made. Kirk disappeared with the film’s budget and was revealed to be a con man named Jeremy Weaver. We follow host Gwen Radford as she tracks down the victims and puts together the pieces of this con three decades later.
itunes.author: Kelly & Kelly

items.creator: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly&Kelly)
items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly&Kelly)
items.title: Introducing: Let's Make A Sci-Fi
items.content:
Producer Dave Shumka introduces a new show from the team behind This Sounds Serious: Let's Make a Sci-Fi, an eight-part adventure through the creative process as three comedians try writing a successful sci-fi pilot— with help from scientific experts and Hollywood screenwriting pros.

In the first episode, hosts Ryan, Mark, and Maddy talk to producers Catherine Winder (Star Wars) and Jem Gerrard (Vagrant Queen) and learn how to identify great story ideas. Then, they pitch each other concepts for their science fiction pilot and land on a winning idea.

Subscribe to Let's Make a Sci-Fi : Apple Podcasts | Spotify

items.title: A Message from Kirk Todd in Jail
items.content: Kirk Todd is back in jail and he has an important message for you: He wants you to vote for This Sounds Serious in the 2021 Webb Awards for Best Writing in a Podcast.  Click here to vote.

items.content: With Kirk’s release from prison and a movie premier in the works, the truth comes into focus.

items.title: 7: Vegas
items.content:
Gwen travels to Las Vegas, where crime writer Frank Reeves tells her that a casino robbery took place during the film shoot, and Kirk buried the movie to hide the evidence.

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly&Kelly)
items.title: 6: Rotten Popcorn
items.content:
After tracking down Grand Casino, Gwen watches the movie and is underwhelmed. She calls on the goofball hosts of the “Rotten Popcorn” podcast to weigh in, and investigates a theory that maybe Kirk was the one who buried the movie.

Click here to get the entire season right now, ad-free.

items.title: 5: The Con Man’s Handbook
items.content:
Gwen finds out how Kirk finally got caught. Kirk insists Grand Casino exists and invites Gwen to use his “Con Man’s Handbook” dictaphone recordings to help uncover it.

items.title: 4: Visiting Hours
items.content:
Gwen travels to Maricopa County Prison to meet Kirk Todd and get inside the mind of a con man. She learns about his marriage to art forger Helen Chatham and the events that tore them apart.

Click here to get the entire season right now, ad-free.

items.title: 3: How to Make a Fake Movie
items.content:
In order to pull off the Grand Casino con, Kirk had to convince the studio and the crew that he was making the movie. How did nobody catch on?

items.title: 2: We Were Filming a Crime Scene
items.content:
Click here to get the entire season right now, ad-free.

How did Kirk Todd put himself in the position to pull off this con? Gwen answers that question and reveals the events of the Grand Casino premier from the red carpet to the chaos in the lobby after the crime is discovered.

items.title: 1: Jeremy, Kenny, Karl, Klaus, and Kirk
items.content:
A 9-1-1 call about a heart attack at a 1991 movie screening leads investigative journalist Gwen Radford to unearth the life story of con man, Kirk Todd, from his childhood crimes through his career as a TV producer, up to Grand Casino, the movie he never made.

Click here to get the entire season right now, ad-free.

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly&Kelly)
items.title: This Sounds Serious: Grand Casino
items.content:
Click here to get the entire season right now, ad-free.

In 1991, TV producer Kirk Todd was supposed to direct his first movie, Grand Casino, but the movie was never made. Kirk disappeared with the film’s budget and was revealed to be a con man named Jeremy Weaver. We follow host Gwen Radford as she tracks down the victims and puts together the pieces of this con three decades later.

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly&Kelly)
items.title: Introducing Record Club
items.content:
From Kelly&Kelly, the studio that brought you This Sounds Serious comes Record Club - a live storytelling podcast that celebrates seminal albums and explores how these albums affect our lives. Hosted by musician Louise Burns, each episode features storytellers telling a true, personal story about how a particular record shaped them. 

Subscribe to Record Club here.

items.title: 8: The Conclusion
items.content: Seriously, what is in those barrels? Surprise evidence found in the quarry leads to a confession, but maybe not justice.

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: 7: The Barrels
items.content: The barrels in Rhoda Day’s backyard may hold the key to Melissa Turner’s disappearance. Gwen wants to find out what’s inside them, but it’s not going to be easy.

items.title: 6: Theories
items.content: Gwen outlines the most likely scenarios about what happened to Melissa Turner. A surprise phone call by a key player bolsters one theory.

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: 5: The Mayor
items.content: Gwen’s focus turns to Rhoda Day, Jimmy’s mother and the longtime mayor of Tom Day. Just how many strings is Rhoda Day pulling in this town? And are they about to snap?

items.title: 4: Subcultures
items.content: Manhattan Media podcast “Here’s Some Information” teams up with TSS to learn about the online society of scent fanatics that could possibly link Jimmy and Melissa.

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: 3: All About Jimmy
items.content: Gwen travels to Tom Day, Oregon the home of serial hostage-taker Jimmy Kline and learns about his criminal past through his mother, his neighbors, and the man himself.

itunes.author: Kelly & Kelly
itunes.subtitle: Gwen travels to Tom Day, Oregon the home of serial hostage-taker Jimmy Kline and learns about his criminal past through his mother, his neighbors, and the man himself.

items.creator: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: 2: Hostages
items.content: Gwen takes us on an audio tour of an incredibly bizarre 9-1-1 call that chronicles the 36 hours that Jimmy Kline held a bank hostage in Tom Day, Oregon, claiming the mayor killed his girlfriend, Melissa Turner.
items.contentSnippet: Gwen takes us on an audio tour of an incredibly bizarre 9-1-1 call that chronicles the 36 hours that Jimmy Kline held a bank hostage in Tom Day, Oregon, claiming the mayor killed his girlfriend, Melissa Turner.

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: 1: Missing Melissa
items.content: A 9-1-1 call from a 2017 bank heist leads investigative journalist Gwen Radford to the story of the country’s most missing person, Melissa Turner. And now Melissa has disappeared again, only this time it’s different.
items.contentSnippet: A 9-1-1 call from a 2017 bank heist leads investigative journalist Gwen Radford to the story of the country’s most missing person, Melissa Turner. And now Melissa has disappeared again, only this time it’s different.

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: This Sounds Serious: Missing Melissa
items.content: After listening to a 9-1-1 call from the longest hostage situation in Oregon history, Gwen finds herself on the trail of America’s most missing person. Season 2 brings you another story so believable it can’t be true. Launching June 2019.

items.title: 8: The Finale
items.content: Daniel travels to Gwen to confront her about the podcast, the 911 call, and the truth.

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: 7: The Trial
items.content: After all the other suspects were ruled out, Daniel Bronstadt went on trial for murder. With his life on the line, he decided to use a rookie attorney… himself.

items.creator: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: 6: The Weatherman Strangler
items.content: Could a serial killer who targeted weathermen be responsible for Chuck Bronstadt’s murder? Gwen looks to the classic true crime TV show, Last Known Whereabouts, for answers. Featuring Lauren Ash (NBC's Superstore).
items.contentSnippet: Could a serial killer who targeted weathermen be responsible for Chuck Bronstadt’s murder? Gwen looks to the classic true crime TV show, Last Known Whereabouts, for answers. Featuring Lauren Ash (NBC's Superstore).

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: 5: The Suspects
items.content: Despite the mountain of evidence against him, Daniel has always maintained that he didn’t kill Chuck. But if he didn’t, who else could have? Featuring: Paul F. Tompkins, Graham Clark.

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: 4: All About Chuck
items.content: While Daniel was in a cult, Chuck’s career as a weatherman was on the rise. But then Daniel returned. Guest star: Paul F. Tompkins.

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: 3: The Cult
items.content: In the 1990s, a cult known as “the Mandala” was infamous for trying to rebuild the lost city of Atlantis. Was Daniel Bronstadt a key member?

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: 2: Meet The Twins
items.content: Journalist Gwen Radford travels to Florida to finally meet Daniel Bronstadt. While at his creepy ranch she learns about the brothers’ past: their boy bands, their twin pranks and their falling out.

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: 1: The Call
items.content: A confusing 9-1-1 call is placed to report the murder of Florida weatherman, Chuck Bronstadt. Journalist Gwen Radford tries to track down the caller only to meet a man who is even more fascinating than the murder itself.

items.author: chris@kellykelly.ca (Kelly & Kelly)
items.title: This Sounds Serious: The Case of Daniel Bronstadt
items.content: This Sounds Serious: The Case of Daniel Bronstadt is a comedic take on the mystery and crime genre that promises to be both gripping and hilarious. This Castbox Original launches in April, 2018.
